description.narrative: The development objective of this project is to strengthen the statistical capacity of the Borrower, fill key data gaps, improve statistical production, and enhance statistical dissemination practices.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Operationality of the NSA | Description :The Borrower shall, not later than twenty-four (24) months after theEffective Date, ensure that the NSA has operational capacity, including staffing and other resources satisfactory to the Bank, toeffectively perform its mandate and assist the PIU in the technical aspects of Project implementation. | Due Date :28-Feb-2019

Finance Agreement :Recruitment of an accountant | Description :The Borrower shall recruit, not later than two (2) months after theEffective Date, an accountant to support the Project financial management activities, in accordance with the provisions of SectionIII of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement and pursuant to terms of reference satisfactory to the Bank. | Due Date :30-Apr-2017

Finance Agreement :Recruitment of an external auditor | Description :The Borrower shall recruit, not later than five (5) monthsafter the Effective Date, the external auditor referred to in Section 5.09(b) of the General Conditions, in accordance with theprovisions of Section III of Schedule 2 to the Fiinancing Agreement and pursuant to terms of reference satisfactory to the Bank. |Due Date :31-Jul-2017

Finance Agreement :Upgrade the PIUâ€™s existing software | Description :The Borrower shall upgrade, not later than two (2) monthsafter the Effective Date, the PIUâ€™s existing accounting software acceptable to the Bank, for the Project. | Due Date :30-Apr-2017
